Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
Essence is life force/energy mentioned by the Heritor secret technology.

The Essence Gash is a large directional rift that spews out volatile essence. Whereas Heritors use it to harvest and profit from its abundance, other creatures often cannot contain the essence within them without their physical form suffering damage.
精华裂缝是一种十分巨大的定向裂隙，喷涌出许多不稳定的精华。继承者能够在这里收集丰富的精华并为其所用，其他来此收集精华的生物将会受到伤害。
Essence is life force/energy mentioned by the Heritor secret technology.

[bulletList][bullet]Annexing this sector grants {Happiness}[happiness/] to the colony.[/bullet][bullet]Annexing this sector causes a colony to generate [abilityred]-20%[/abilityred][energy/][/bullet][bullet]Non-[abilityblue]Heritor[/abilityblue] units do not regain [hp/] out of combat while within this sector[/bullet][bullet]Every {combatturnnumber}[turn/] turns:[/bullet] [bulletList][bullet]Units have an {strength}[strengthentropy/] strength chance to gain an [abilityblue]Essence Charge[/abilityblue][/bullet][br/][br/]In addition, non-[abilityblue]Heritor[/abilityblue] and non-[abilityblue]Forgotten[/abilityblue] Units take {damage}[damageentropy/] damage every time they gain an[abilityblue]Essence Charge[/abilityblue].

[bulletList][bullet]吞并该区域将使殖民地获得 {Happiness}[happiness/]。[/bullet][bullet]吞并该区域将使殖民地的 [energy/] 产量 [abilityred]-20%[/abilityred][/bullet][bullet]非[abilityblue]继承者[/abilityblue]单位在该区域内脱离战斗后不会恢复 [hp/][/bullet][bullet]每 {combatturnnumber}[turn/] 个回合：[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]单位有 {strength}[strengthentropy/] 力量几率获得一个[abilityblue]精华充能[/abilityblue][/bullet][br/][br/]此外，非[abilityblue]继承者[/abilityblue]单位和非[abilityblue]被遗忘者[/abilityblue]单位每获得一个[abilityblue]精华充能[/abilityblue]，就会受到 {damage}[damageentropy/] 伤害。
Essence is life force/energy mentioned by the Heritor secret technology. Heritor is the new secret technology in this expansion of Planetfall.

Every {combatturnnumber}[turn/] turns: [bulletList][bullet]Units have an {strength}[strengthentropy/] strength chance to gain an [abilityblue]Essence Charge[/abilityblue][/bullet][br/][br/]In addition, non-[abilityblue]Heritor[/abilityblue] and non-[abilityblue]Forgotten[/abilityblue] Units take {damage}[damageentropy/] damage every time they gain an[abilityblue]Essence Charge[/abilityblue].

每 {combatturnnumber}[turn/] 个回合：[bulletList][bullet]单位有 {strength}[strengthentropy/] 力量几率获得一个[abilityblue]精华充能[/abilityblue][/bullet][br/][br/]此外，非[abilityblue]继承者[/abilityblue]单位和非[abilityblue]被遗忘者[/abilityblue]单位每获得一个[abilityblue]精华充能[/abilityblue]，就会受到 {damage}[damageentropy/] 伤害。
Essence is life force/energy mentioned by the Heritor secret technology.

This unit is affected by the Essence Gash in this sector, nullifying the [hp/] regeneration received per strategic turn.[br/][br/] In addition, this unit suffers {damage}[damageentropy/] damage every time it gains an [abilityblue]Essence Charge[/abilityblue].
该单位受到该区域精华裂缝影响，每个战略回合获得的 [hp/] 恢复将会无效。[br/][br/]此外，该单位每获得一个[abilityblue]精华充能[/abilityblue]，就会受到 {damage}[damageentropy/] 伤害。
Essence is life force/energy mentioned by the Heritor secret technology.
